item.title: How to Create Read Update Delete in Php Mysql With Pdo
item.description: Visual CRUD in PHP In this video tutorial I have shown how to make a basic crud application in php. I have connected with database using php PDO(php data object). Which is database agnostic. You can connect any sql database with this procedure. Objective of this video You will be able to create, read, update, delete in php You will understand php data object(PDO). PDO is database agnostic.
